articles.author: JONATHAN LANDRUM Jr.
articles.title: Usher, Fantasia Barrino, 'Color Purple' honored at 55th NAACP Image Awards - The Associated Press
articles.description: Usher was named entertainer of the year at the 55th annual NAACP Awards that highlighted works by entertainers and writers of color. After Usher accepted his award Saturday night, the superstar singer spoke about being thankful about the journey of his succes…
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES (AP) Usher was named entertainer of the year at the 55th annual NAACP Awards on Saturday night, which highlighted works by entertainers and writers of color.
